WRITING.TITLE: Game in a very unbalanced state and is Kelsonk abandonong the game?
WRITING.TEXT:
On the facebook page Kelonk wrote that he is burned out and no more design updates indefinitely. The game is currently in a very unbalanced state and if this forum is any indication the fan base is leaving. If balance isnt brought back, I think it will die.
I did not play before the recent changes a few weeks ago wen progress was really fast. I am not comparing to that. I am level 90, on NG 2 and bought 6 clicks a second plus the XP bonus. I have not progress reset yet. In a post yeaterday, Kelsonk said I should not progress reset and should go until the game sloes down. Its a crawl. The only way to progress is to manually tap for hours or root my phone and install an auto tapper. Even then its slow.
1. The finger does not appear to click 6/times a second. As soon as I tap, my gain goes up alot. I cant tap 6/times a second so something us wrong. If its a performance thing, its may be better to just o one combined tap every 5 seconds so I would get a 30x tap every 5 seconds.
2. As soon as you make a mysterium and upgrade your boats, sailors are totally useless. On NG 2 a basic galley set to go for 1 hour, that has 5 level 37 sailors will reduce time by 2 minutes.
2. Workers in generally are useless. Its multiple days with 10 workers to clear out a mine. This means they are useless.
3. The only way to harvest/build/refine is to tap for hours. There are only so many tap bonus items I will get. I have spent some money, but Im not going to spend hundreds of dollars to progress. No one will. If you want people to spend more money you have to give us a reason. For example the finger auto tapper length should be upgradeable with gem stones at a reasonable price. 7 minutes when it now takes 2 hours or more of tapping to clear a mine.
4. The increase of 2300x in cost for every NG is arbitrary and is way too large.
5. Whole Cities give such a small bonus they dont do much of anything. I git several levels in the one that increased my ship and its not noticeable. Did you even test this?
6. Price increases on buildings like Dragon Forge, Kinetic Rune factory, university is so huge it does not allow the game to scale with the absurd 2300x cost increase.
7. Time for ships isnt that big of a deal. I didnt play before, but people complaining seem to want this to go too fast. That being said sailors and whole city bonus to speed are totally useless.
8. Why is the progress reset static? You get a set amount. That standard in games is that prestige increases are based on some formula of what you did. Its also not clear that if you progress reset and rebuild your guilds do you double your multipliers again? So they dont go down when you you lose NG?
Can you put some thought into a good progress reset mechanic?
9. Progress reset should say exactly how many NG you go down. Not a few.
10. The time of the Auto tapper should be increase to be increased with gems and achievements. It should be like 1 minute for 10 gems. This is an idle game. It should go up in 15 minute chunks. It should work offline. I dont want to run my phone in a game all day. Ill wear down my device. Also as said above, its not tapping at the correct speed or its not getting the full amount. I dont want to be tied to the game. If it takes a while to mine or build, I need to be able to run offline and workers are totally useless.
11. Return in banks is so low and take so long they are totally useless for anything other than achievements.
12. Bonuses from artifacts are basically a who cares for most of them. Per the wiki page a bunch dont do anything. So why have them?
Lag issues: playing on a samsung S6. 3 years old. Only thing running. People dont buy new phones every year.
1. Game freezes after a period of time. Maybe due to running out of memory. Allow a low res mode that gets rid of graphics, sjowing tap and worker values and workers spinning.
2. Allow an option to only collect auto tap and workers every few seconds. Maybe a slider. So if its every 10 seconds you just get 10x.
3. Game seems to pause fir half a second at intervals with workers. Adding 1 and 2 should help with that
What engine are you using now? I havent seen any release posts from you in a long time
Become a cop. You can arrest asshole customers.

This slightly off topic. I got declined by Aetna for insurance and placed in Hipaa in 2007 for allergy shots. I had always had company plans. I stayed in IT, but most of the work was contracting (temp work with no benefits). Cobra ran out after 18 months. So I needed insurance. All I had were allergy shots and 2 generic prescriptions for allergies that I did not need that much. Both of these are now over the counter. There are a bunch of antihistamines and nasal sprays that went over the counter in the last few years. I think the total cost on all this plus 1 allergy doctor visit a year was maybe $1500 total if that much. Most was shots.
The shots were not optional. Im allergic to everything and prone to sinus infections. Took several years, but they helped alot. I had a permanent stuffed up nose and nasal drip plus cough before that. Had surgery twice to relieve constant stuffiness at that point.
Not life threatening, but sucked and not expensive treat.
Aetna automatic declined everyone if they have more than 2 things. Back then the regulation was that if you got declined you went into the Hipaa high risk pool. It had a $10,000 deductable, $2000 a month, didnt cover allergies or much of anything else. So i was in the same category risk category cancer.
This is massive profit fir Aetna. I would only need insurance if something really bad happened. I asked if they could just remove allergy treatment from the regular plan and was told no. Aetna used Hipaa as a profit center. Move as many people as possible to it to make money.
Health insurance is a yearly contract. So if I got Aetna then went on allergy shots/medication automatically to Hipaa. Fucking ridiculous.
I eventually got a good plan from BlueCross.
It was stressful. I didnt expect any issues getting medical insurance. You had to pay to apply. So there is a dicentive to apply to multiple companies at once. Technically you get the money back if you dont take the insurance. It took like a month to get approved. I had to scramble and get bridge insurance until I got approved by BlueCross because if I get into a car accident or something, I am bankrupt without insurance.
Total fucking bullshit. I have an employer again who provides health insurance so Im fine. Unless I get cancer, cant work, and Cobra runs out in 18 months and I either have not died or not healthy again.
